title: Modular architecture skill
description: Focus: clear boundaries, ownership, and dependency direction. Include guidance on module seams, layering, and reuse points.

title: Prompt expander agent
description: Purpose: expand raw prompts into structured specs with constraints and edge cases. Output: a concise spec suitable for handoff to a writer agent.

title: Orgmode skill
description: Focus: maintain task lists in org format with TODO headings and metadata. Include formatting rules (no blank line before bullets, aligned indents), and support for DEADLINE/PROPERTIES usage.

title: Naming discipline skill
description: Focus: shared vocabulary for discoverable reuse. Include naming rules, glossary patterns, and deprecation guidance.

title: Agent-writing command
description: Inputs: raw prompt plus any repo-specific constraints. Behavior: runs Prompt expander as subagent, then Agent writer, and emits final text.

title: Code review rigor skill
description: Focus: review checklists that catch duplication and divergence early. Include review heuristics, examples, and escalation paths.

title: Abstraction judgment skill
description: Focus: decide when to generalize vs keep logic local. Include heuristics for duplication thresholds and readability tradeoffs.

title: Configure beads role
description: Configure beads for this repo (set beads.role via bd init or bd config set).

title: API design skill
description: Focus: stable, minimal interfaces that prevent repeated glue code. Include error shapes, versioning strategy, and naming conventions.

title: Technical documentation skill
description: Focus: document patterns and examples that encourage reuse. Include where docs live, ownership, and update cadence.

title: Incremental delivery skill
description: Focus: small, safe changes to avoid forked quick fixes. Include rollout strategy, feature flags, and split PR guidelines.

title: Dependency management skill
description: Focus: prefer shared libraries over bespoke utilities. Include evaluation criteria, upgrade policy, and deprecation plan.

title: Agent writer agent
description: Purpose: generate final agent text from the expanded spec. Output: production-ready agent description and workflow guidance.

title: Refactor skill
description: Focus: reduce duplication by extracting shared logic and simplifying control flow. Include guidance on safe refactors, test coverage, and avoiding over-abstraction.

title: Requirements clarity skill
description: Focus: elicit intent, scope, constraints, and acceptance criteria before changes. Include question prompts and decision logs to prevent parallel implementations.

title: Testing strategy skill
description: Focus: deterministic tests with shared fixtures to reduce scaffolding duplication. Include test pyramid guidance and fixture organization.
